instruction:
Suburban-Rural Map Reading

This section of the test contains multiple-choice questions, which you must answer by using your computer mouse to select the correct response. Upon answering a question, you can go to the next question by clicking the Next button on the Menu bar.

During this section of the test, if you choose you may skip an item and then later return to that item.

When you are finished, select Submit from the Menu bar. Your Test Administrator may have set a time limit for this test section. If there is a time limit, you will be told how much time you have. If a time limit has been set for this section of the test, you will notice a countdown timer on the Header of the screen, showing the amount of time remaining to complete this section of the test.

We recommend that you go to the practice version of this section of the test to learn more about how you should respond to items during this section of the test.

questions.questionText: What direction is the Diner from the Animal Hospital?
What street does NOT cross the Interstate?
While obeying all traffic signs, what is the route with the shortest distance from the Diner to the Fillmore street entrance of the Urgent Care?

options.text: Travel East on Washington, turn right on Jackson, turn left on Madison, turn right on Fillmore.
Travel East on Washington, turn right on Fillmore.
Travel West on Washington, turn left onto Interstate 38, turn left onto Madison, turn right on Fillmore.
Travel East on Washington, turn right on Tyler, turn right on Madison, turn left on Fillmore.

questions.questionText: A medical vehicle is trying to get to the Urgent Care from the Fire House. While obeying all traffic signs, which of the following routes would allow the medical vehicle to get to the Urgent Care from the Fire House with the fewest number of turns?

options.text: Travel South on Lincoln, turn left on Adams, turn right on Harding, turn right on Madison.
Travel South on Lincoln, turn left on Jefferson, turn right onto Interstate 38, turn left on Madison.
Travel East on Washington, turn right on Fillmore.
Travel East on Washington, turn right on Harding, turn left on Madison.

questions.questionText: A person is driving East on Jefferson. After they make a left turn on Tyler, what direction are they traveling?
What street is the South entrance of the Animal Hospital on?

A person makes a left turn onto Fillmore street from the post office entrance located on Polk street. They then turn left onto Jefferson and then left onto Interstate 38. What direction are they now traveling?

You are driving a vehicle that is too heavy to drive on a interstate over-pass. What would be the fastest route you can take to get from the corner of Lincoln and Jefferson to the entrance of the Urgent Care located at the corner of Tyler and Madison, while obeying all traffic signs and not driving over an interstate?

options.text: Travel East on Jefferson, turn right on Tyler.
Travel East on Jefferson, turn right onto Interstate 38, turn left onto Madison.
Travel South on Lincoln, turn left on Adams, turn right on Harding, turn left on Madison.
This vehicle will not be able to travel to the Urgent Care from its current location without crossing an interstate.

questions.questionText: A truck is returning to the firehouse parking lot which is located on the Northeast corner of the Fire House. At what intersection is that location?

options.text: The Northeast corner of the Fire House is not located at an intersection.

questions.questionText: What direction can a car travel on Garfield while obeying all traffic signs?
Starting at the Garage, if a person is traveling South on Harding, how many street intersections will that person cross before they come to the end of the street?
What direction should an ambulance head if they are at the corner of Washington and Tyler and they must get to the Urgent Care by the shortest route possible, while obeying all traffic signs?

There is an accident at the intersection of Lincoln and Adams. You have two ambulances currently available, one located at the corner of Washington and Fillmore and one located at the corner of Madison and Garfield. Which ambulance has to travel the shortest distance to get to the accident while obeying all traffic signs?

options.text: The ambulance on the Northeast side of the interstate.
The ambulance on the Southwest side of the interstate.
It depends on the current level of traffic.
It will take an equal amount of distance for either ambulance to reach the accident.

questions.questionText: A person is driving from the intersection of Garfield and Washington. They drive East on Washington, turn right on Tyler, then turn right on Polk and travel one block before stopping. Where are they located?

options.text: The corner of Tyler and Polk
The corner of Jackson and Polk
The corner of Fillmore and Polk

questions.questionText: A car is traveling East on Jefferson from the corner of Harding and Jefferson. The driver wishes to travel North on Interstate 38. How should they enter onto the interstate?

options.text: Upon reaching Interstate 38 turn right onto the interstate onramp.
Upon reaching Interstate 38 turn left onto the interstate onramp.
After crossing Interstate 38 turn right onto the interstate onramp.
After crossing Interstate 38 turn left onto the interstate onramp.
